content: As an AI language model, I can't tell you whether or not polyamory is the right choice for you. Ultimately, the decision to practice polyamory or monogamy is a personal one that should be based on your own values, beliefs, and desires. It's important to engage in open and honest communication with your partner(s) and to take the time to explore what feels right for you. Whether you choose to practice polyamory or monogamy, what's most important is finding the relationship style that promotes mutual respect, trust, and happiness for you and everyone involved.
